title: Kansas chiropractor develops controversial sanitary product that glues vaginas shut — RT Viral
text:
Kansas chiropractor develops controversial sanitary product that glues vaginas shut Published time: 24 Feb, 2017 01:20 Get short URL © Vikki Grant / www.globallookpress.com A Kansas chiropractor has developed a horrifying sanitary product that helps women contain their menstrual fluid by literally gluing their vaginas shut. 
“ Mensez ” the “ feminine lip-stick ” is a “ natural ” adhesive in a lipstick applicator that “ creates a temporary seal to retain menstrual fluids inside until urination .” Mensez feminine lipstick is a natural compound of amino acids and oil in a lipstick applicator. #50centsPeriod #Mensez pic.twitter.com/9mkqpE1kaO 
The brains behind the bizarre invention is Dr. Daniel Dopps of Wichita, Kansas, who was granted a US patent for the product on January 10. Me: I got my period. Mensez: Literally glue your vagina shut. — Aura Bogado (@aurabogado) February 22, 2017 
Mensez gained notoriety when Dopps shared an introductory post on the product’s, now deactivated, Facebook page, in which he compared the vagina-sealing sensation to waking up with your lips stuck together: “ It didn’t hurt and it was kind of fun .” 
Dopps then responded to critics in the post’s comment section to lambaste women, who he says are “ distracted by [their] period 25 percent of the time ” for not coming up with a “ better solution than diapers and plugs .” 
Women, men and even Dopps supposed brother, however, have questioned the chiropractor's understanding of basic anatomy. This is the mensez guys brother omg pic.twitter.com/rOhYSnsA5X — Ghost with the most (@AliciaGerhardt) February 19, 2017 I. Just...NO... As a guy, I'm mortified at the lack of basic anatomy on display. Also would like to point out he named it Men Says... #Mensez pic.twitter.com/ukJFPyP5id
